Name: Suffer Scarf
LongDescription: Absorbs damage from Dark-type moves to restore HP. Keep it in the Treasure Bag to give its benefit to all of these team members: Wynaut and Wobbuffet.  You can get a Suffer Scarf at the Croagunk Swap Shop by swapping: a Wobbu-Sweat, a Wobbu-Card, and an Endure Rock. That's the easy way! An item with a ☆☆☆-rarity rating is very hard to get. It's beyond valuable!
